  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy

    public class SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyVcs
extends BasicSearchIndexerUpdateStrategy
    This is the implementation of the SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy for SearchIndexerSource.UPDATE_STRATEGY_LAST_MODIFIED.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

        protected void doInitialize()

        ATTENTION:
        When you override this method from a sub-class you need to do a super.AbstractComponent.doInitialize().

      • createScmManager

        protected org.apache.maven.scm.manager.ScmManager createScmManager()
        This method creates the ScmManager instance manually. This method is called during initialization if the ScmManager has NOT been set (injected) otherwise.
        Returns:
        the created ScmManager.

      • detectVcsType

        protected String detectVcsType(File location)
                        throws RuntimeException
        This method tries to detect the VCS type for the given location.
        Parameters:
        location - is the location for which the VCS-type is requested.
        Returns:
        the detected VCS-type.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the VCS-type could NOT be detected.
